items.name: Rune Hold
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill
Adds 9 to 18 Fire Damage to Attacks

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 29% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Step
flavourText: "Those who dance are considered insane
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

properties.name: Attack, Minion, Duration, Movement, Travel, Bow

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.
explicitMods: This Attack and Minions have 30% increased Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Cold, Travel, Blink, AoE

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving Chilled ground in an area at both ends of the teleport. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods:
19% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Normal or Magic Enemy in Area
99% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for each Rare or Unique Enemy in Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have 19% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 28% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 18% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Devoto's Devotion
enchantMods: Haste has 30% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency
flavourText: Swift as thought are the actions of Man
when borne on wings of divine providence.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +8% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that affect you and allies, increasing the aura's effect on allies, but preventing it from affecting you at all. Cannot support curse auras, or other auras that only affect enemies. Cannot support skills used by totems.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 32% increased Aura Area of Effect
Supported Auras do not affect you
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 40% increased Effect
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which makes nearby allies inflict impale with attacks, and lessens the accuracy of nearby enemies. Gain stages by impaling enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 20% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
You and nearby Allies have 19% increased Impale Effect
Nearby Enemies have 21% less Accuracy Rating
Gain 1 Stage when you Impale an Enemy while carrying the Banner, up to 5 per second
Gain +10 to maximum Fortification for 0.05 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Stone of Lazhwar
flavourText: You are slow, foolish and ignorant.
I am not.

items.name: Queen of the Forest
explicitMods: 1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-43 Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals
flavourText: Shedding away her regal past,
she forged a new destiny.
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man,
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature.
Seizing her one true wish,
she found peace at last.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% increased Skill Effect Duration

When you Hit an Enemy with an Arrow from a Supported Skill, Summon a Mirage Archer which uses that Skill
Mirage Archer can use Triggered Attacks as though they were not Triggered
Mirage Archer uses Supported Skill with 60% less Attack Speed
Mirage Archer deals 31% less Damage with Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: Ensnared Enemies take 20% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Widowhail
explicitMods: 248% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText:
Supports skills with cooldowns.
Cannot support triggered skills.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.

Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 20% increased Inspiration Charge Duration
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that you cast yourself. Cannot support triggered skills, Vaal skills, instant skills, channelling skills, skills with a reservation or which create minions, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 59% increased Area of Effect
Supported Spells lose 1 Intensity every 0.25 seconds while moving, or immediately if you teleport

Supported Spells gain Intensity when you Cast them, to a maximum of 3
Supported Skills deal 14% more Area Damage with Hits per Intensity
Supported Skills have 15% less Area of Effect per Intensity

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical, Chaos, Orb

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 39% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rearguard
implicitMods: Adds 9 to 13 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: "It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

implicitMods: Creates a Smoke Cloud on Use
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
